Documentation.long_help: This filter will take a vtkTable object and reshape it. This filter essentially treats vtkTables as 2D matrices and reshapes them using numpy.reshape in a C contigous manner. Unfortunately, data fields will be renamed arbitrarily because VTK data arrays require a name.
Documentation.short_help: This filter will take a vtkTable object and reshape it. This filter essentially treats vtkTables as 2D matrices and reshapes them using numpy.reshape in a C contigous manner. Unfortunately, data fields will be renamed arbitrarily because VTK data arrays require a name.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.
